# Security Duty Weapons
## Foreword While firearms of all varieties are incredibly common across known-space, the NanoTrasen Corporation does not permit individuals without proper licenses to carry weapons onboard its stations. [color=#a40000]Carrying any weapon on NanoTrasen property without proper authorization is a crime.[/color]
## Armament escalation Code Green: Security and Command are only permitted to visibly carry small firearms like pistols, lethal rounds permitted. (CCO may carry a chester if loaded with non-lethal rounds) Code Blue: Security and Command are permitted to carry longer arms and rifles including lethal ammunitions at the discretion of the HOS and warden. Avoid excessive arming. Code Red: Security and Commmand are expected to carry heavy weaponry to keep the crew safe.
Salvagers are allowed to carry special salvager weapons which aren't traditional firearms but special weaponry made for just salvage specialists.
